title: The Widow Barnaby - many other brides

content.question: In context, which of the following is most likely implied by the narrator in the final sentence of the passage about “many other brides”?

choices.label: They became more dissatisfied with their marriages as time progressed.
They found their husbands, who were very indulgent, to be excessively so over time.
They soon discovered that their station in life suffered a sharp decline.
They had worked hard to secure a proposal of marriage.

content.answer: They became more dissatisfied with their marriages as time progressed.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
